metadata.description: Four of Richard Matheson's classic tales of terror are collected in this graphic novel collection: I Am Legend (Steve Niles with Elman Brown), Hell House (Ian Edginton with Simon Frasier), Duel (Chris Ryall with Rara Garres), and The Shrinking Man (Ted Adams with Mark Torres). Matheson's classics come to vivid life in these inspired comic book adaptations.
metadata.name: Richard Matheson: Master of Terror Graphic Novel Collection
